title: Sequence Embedded Wallets
description: Sequence Embedded Wallet Smart WaaS: secure, customizable, gaming-grade non-custodial wallets.
longDescription:
From the creators of the first account abstract and smart contract wallets, Sequence Embedded Wallets offer a smooth and secure non-custodial toolkit for developers to integrate blockchain technology into their games easily. With our Smart Wallet-as-a-Service (WaaS), developers can instantly create, launch, and manage seamless onboarding experiences that are easy and familiar to their users — like existing gaming accounts — where the tech intricacies are out of sight and out of mind for players.


Sequence Embedded Wallets invisibly create on-chain player accounts for any Unreal game on any device, allowing developers to leverage the benefits of web3 technology for improved user acquisition, increased retention, and higher monetization. Games with web3 features also reward players in new ways for their play time, achievements, and commitment to the games' communities.


With the ability to spin up wallets on-demand for each player, developers wanting to integrate their game with any EVM-compatible blockchain becomes a breeze. Whether it's app chains, subnets, Layer 2s, or Layer 3s, Sequence covers it with familiar constructions like RPC APIs.


Our solution is your perfect match where security, frictionless transactions, and uninterrupted gameplay are the top priority.


Complete customization

Make self-custody accounts that look and feel native to your game and game UI.


No transaction signing or pop-ups

Keep blockchain in the background and players immersed in your game with seamless transactions, no downloads, no add-ons, and no pop-ups.


Email, social, or existing auth login

Let users onboard with the methods that are easy and familiar to them, like existing player profiles, social accounts, or email.


Embedded without add ons

Sequence Smart WaaS never requires app downloads, extensions, or add ons. It's embedded and invisible.


Features:

  • Embedded smart contract account abstraction wallet
  • Fully customizable with in-game UI
  • Non-custodial
  • No transaction signing
  • No pop-ups, no downloads
  • 2FA support
  • Recovery support
  • Integrated marketplace support
  • Guest wallet support
  • Social login (OAuth) like Google, Apple, Discord etc.
  • Custom OAuth
technicalDetails:
Full docs and technical information can be found here: Sequence Embedded Wallets Technical Documentation


Features:

  • Embedded smart contract account abstraction wallet
  • Non-custodial
  • No transaction signing
  • No pop-ups
  • 2FA support
  • Recovery support
  • Integrated marketplace support
  • Guest wallet support
  • Social login (OAuth) like Google, Apple, Discord etc.
  • Custom OAuth


The Sequence Unreal Embedded Wallet SDK provides full Sequence Embedded Wallet and Indexer integration for games built on the Unreal Framework.



Requirements​

  • Unreal 5.2 or later
  • Android
  • iOS
  • PC standalone
  • Mac standalone


Supported Development Platforms: Unreal 5.2 or later, Android, iOS, PC standalone, Mac standalone

Supported Target Build Platforms: Unreal 5.2 or later

Documentation: https://docs.sequence.xyz/sdk/unreal/overview

releaseInfo.releaseNote: This is a version of Sequence Unreal without a HUD that is backwards compatible with Unreal Engine 5.2.
This is a version of Sequence Unreal without a HUD that is backwards compatible with Unreal Engine 5.3.

- Added full support for blueprints
- Added support for PlayFab and Guest Login
- Various fixes and improvements
